sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent { type: string = "password"; isText: boolean = false; eyeIcon: string = "fa-eye-slash"; constructor(){} hideShowPass(){ this.isText = !this.isText; this.isText ? this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye" : this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye-slash" this.isText ? this.type = "text" : this.type = "password"; } }
